Articles.Content:
I pull out a lightsaber and battle you for the cookie. I cut your lightsaber in half and take the cookie.

my cookie.

The force of the impossibility of cutting a lightsaber in half knocks you back, and I snatch the cookie in mid-air.

My cookies.

I look you straight in the eye, and you are powerless to stop me as I slowly pluck the cookie from your fingers and walk away.

My cookie.

I dig a pit and wait for you to fall. Due to cartoon physics, you stay for a while before my trained pigeons takes you cookie.

My cookie. I have pigeons....

Pigeons eat the cookie, get heavy and fall down into the pit together with him.

Previous poster's heavy pigeons with cookie inside.

Luckily they are TopHeavy (TM) and fall upwards out of the pit and into my hand. I then wait for...well. you know...and reconstruct the cookie in a completely edible state.

My pigeons and cookie.
I hire assassin cats to drug you and reclaim my pigeons and cookie.

I do this to your pigeons.

My cookie.
Zombie pigeons come to you for their cookie.

I channel my inner Isaac Clarke. There are no more zombie pigeons. I pick the cookie up from the ground where the terrified Tex dropped it.

My cookie.

A trained strike force of guinea pigs come to your house and change the fact of your existence. The cookie is left for me to take.

My cookie.

The New Guinea Police Officers' Union sues you for defamatory speech. The court finds you guilty. Your fine is one cookie.

Union's cookie.

After my failed business, I secured a job as an official in the Union. Unfortunately, I am corrupt and embezzle the cookie.

My cookie.
You are fired from the union due to your embezzlement of the cookie. I replace you and am payed a cookie for my first day on the job.

And now you can pay your fee to the landlord.

His cookie.
Luckily, I am said landlord. I keep cookie.

I am the Tax Man! Your tax is exactly 1 cookie.

My cookie

Quote

 

i use my i don't watch the info but when im forced to by someone that get me out of my cell so i go over my 0.7 lunch a day

my oh thoos "animal" don't like ntmf ... and you figure it just now ? as far as i m concerned with this the last 9 years ... 

my cookies

When doing my taxes, I found that I had actually incrementally paid more during the year, and my tax return just so happens to be one cookie.

My cookie.
Happy and generous, you give this cookie to a volunteer squad behind your door.

Good thing I posed as a volunteer.

 

My Cookie!

I bake a new cookie and bring it to a secret underground base at unknown coordinates on the Moon.

my cookie
You get shocked realizing that somebody has stolen it even there.
You in turn are shocked that I stole it before they realised you'd stolen it.

I recover from my shock, grab the cookie, bring it into my space suit with me, seal my space suit and deprresurise the base. And leave for Jupiter on a spacecraft. 

My cookie and very obvious secret moon base on the far side of the moon.
